description:
FlavorDisabled extension lacks API Sample Tests to documentation.

Please take a look into the related blueprint (https://blueprints.launchpad.net/nova/+spec/nova-api-samples) to get to know the actions to fix this bug.
title: FlavorDisabled extension doesn't have API Sample Tests and Docextension doesn't have API Sample Tests to Documentation
